p1: If you cannot claim online, you can send Access to Work claims by post.
li1: fill in the paper claim form we sent with your Access to Work award letter
li2: include any receipts or invoices we ask for in the claims form
h2: You should post your claim to Access to Work:
p3-3: to get a paper claim form if you need one.
p4: You'll get a text message or email to let you know when we've received your claim form.
